subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: John Degenkolb of Germany timed his sprint perfectly to win the 12th stage of the Vuelta a España, and Alberto Contador retained the overall lead by 20 seconds over Alejandro Valverde.
snippet: John Degenkolb of Germany timed his sprint perfectly to win the 12th stage of the Vuelta a España, and Alberto Contador retained the overall lead by 20 seconds over Alejandro Valverde.
